summary: Max Karl Ernst Ludwig Planck  was a physicist from Germany.
full_text: Julius Edgar Lilienfeld  was an Austro-Hungarian-born German physicist and electronic engineer. He was born to a Jewish family in Lemberg in Austria-Hungary  and moved to the United States in the early 1920s . Lilienfeld is credited with the first patents on the field-effect transistor  and electrolytic capacitor .
title: Julius Edgar Lilienfeld
